TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. After it carves itself into billions of tiny little pieces, the pieces begin marching towards you. And they intend to carve you.

I wish for Groot.

Granted. You recieve tiny twig Groot, and he freezes whenever you look at him.

I wish I could fly on the Vomit Comet!

Granted. And you're fine, no sickness. The 11 other people on the flight though all projectile vomit in zero gravity.

I wish for a non-explosive ride on SpaceShipTwo.

Granted. Due to Space Lag (which totally isn't a thing), you get lagged outside of the spacecraft and bad vacuum things happen to you.

I wish that Space Lag totally wasn't a thing.

Granted. But time lag now exists in its place

i wish for more kerbals

Granted. One new Kerbal is added to the potential infinity of them.

I wish to visit the point at infinity.

Granted. You end up in a black hole. Those things are infinity, right?

I wish for a red shirt guy.

Granted, here's a red shirt, and oh, look there's a blood sucking alien cloud creature coming your way!

I wish for a working phaser.

Granted. You accidentally stun yourself, and upon awaking you accidentally set the phaser to kill and shoot yourself again.

I wish Star Trek technology was available today to everyone.

Granted. We are the Borg. You will be assimilated. Resistance is futile.

I wish functional and safe sonic screwdrivers were on general sale and affordable to non-plutocrats.

granted, but they break when used for more than 2 seconds.

i wish for something bad.

Granted. You get a bad case of depression and jump off the nearest bridge.

I wish for my very own supersecret villain lair with nukes, traps and a submarine base.

Granted. It is infiltrated by James Bond and is destroyed around you.

I wish I was as cool as James Bond.

granted. james bond gets angry at you and kills you.

i wish for a non explosive nuke

Granted. You accidentally break it and the radioactive material falls on the ground, somehow turning supercritical and causing you to die of radiation poisoning.

I wish for a fish that could squish a dish.

Granted, you got a shark.

I wish that this wish will not be corrupted.

granted, but since you did not wish for anything it is corrupted.

i wish for C4

Granted. But you can never obtain a detonator.

I wish get-iplayer would start working again.

It does, but all that's on it is Morecambe and Wise.

I wish that nobody ever said fam-a-lam.

Granted. WASSUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUP!

I wish I didn't need the loo.

Granted. Enjoy your catheter and colostomy bag.

I wish I could get over this head cold.

Granted. It is now a shoe cold, and your feet die.

I wish that Swish rhymed with Fish and Dish.

Granted. Swish now does not rhyme with george and monkey.

I wish for a new computer, preferably an HP Stream, Natural Silver colored, which Office 365 and windows 8.1.

Granted. The manufacturers were elves and made the silicon out of silver. The computer breaks your desk out of immense weight and falls apart.

I wish for the ability to make silicon out of silver.

Granted. I'm not sure what *use* that serves, but the KGB know and they abduct you and send you to the gulag.

I wish for a decent lampshade.
